text: anriyum (marumaiyil allah ivarkalai nokki), "nam unkalai mutal muraiyakap pataittome atuponru ninkal (etuvumillamal) taniye em'mitam vantuvittirkal; innum; nam unkalukku alittavarraiyellam unkal mutukukalukkup pinnal vittu vittirkal; evarkalai ninkal unkalutaiya kuttalikal enru ennik kontiruntirkalo, unkalukkup parintu pecuvarkal (enru ennik kontiruntirkalo) avarkalai nam unkalutaniruppataik kanavillai, unkalukkitaiye irunta totarpum aruntu vittatu, unkalutaiya nampikkaikal ellam tavarivittana" (enru kuruvan)
